begin: ^Back already, huh? So, what’s the plan? You ready to make some real money?

c-0: ^Yeah, I’ve thought about it. I’ll take the job, Oscar.
^Good choice, my man! Now, let’s start simple. There’s a card game happening in the back tonight. All you gotta do is keep an eye on things, make sure they lose .
^Lets call that a night man, see you tomorrow.
